Capacitive

Touch Sensor

The project has been in development for BLANK.

  • (CTS) is a gesture sensitive functional textile touch-pad interface for physical devices.
  • It is produced as a single piece of fabric requiring only two electrodes to connect it to a microcontroller.
  • The sensor offers a solution for a flexible touch interface with consistent location detection, responsiveness, comfort and unobtrusiveness.

    • Publications

  • Digital fabrication of textiles: an analysis of electrical networks in 3D knitted functional fabrics
  • Development of a Carbon Fiber Knitted Capacitive Touch Sensor

    • Patients

  • Vallett, R., Young, R., Kara, C., Lehrich, R., Dion, G., Kim, Y. (2017). Fabric touch sensor. US, Drexel University. PCT/US2016/064108.
  • Contact us at functionalfabrics@drexel.edu for more information.
